title.narrative: OUTPUT 3.D: SCHOOL FUNCTIONING

description.narrative: School functionality is enhanced through support to teachers and school-based staff, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved access for girls and boys in targeted communities to equitable and inclusive education opportunities of good quality

participating-org.narrative: EDUCATION TECHNICAL OFFICE MINISTRY OF EDUCATION

sector.narrative: Other activities for equitable access to quality education e.g. school feeding, school grants

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: School functionality is enhanced through support to teachers and school-based staff

description.narrative: This Output focused on supporting continued school functionality during the crisis. During the reporting period, UNICEF reinforced two core conditions necessary to keep school open for children: a) the continued presence of teachers in classrooms and b) a conducive school environment. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/01/2021
